mapper.select: SELECT M.OSPEC_NO, M.OPTION_CATEGORY, M.OPTION_VALUE, M.OSPEC_REMARK, M.REMARK_TYPE, M.REMARK, M.LIST_ID FROM PREBOM_OSPEC_MANDATORY M WHERE M.OSPEC_NO = #{OSPEC_NO, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY M.OPTION_CATEGORY, M.OPTION_VALUE, M.REMARK_TYPE, M.REMARK
SELECT * FROM PREBOM_OSPEC_MANDATORY_TRIM A WHERE LIST_ID = #{LIST_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PREBOM_OSPEC_MANDATORY(OSPEC_NO, OPTION_CATEGORY, OPTION_VALUE, OSPEC_REMARK, REMARK_TYPE, REMARK, LIST_ID, CREATE_USER) VALUES (#{OSPEC_NO, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OPTION_CATEGORY, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OPTION_VALUE, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OSPEC_REMARK, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REMARK_TYPE, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{REMARK, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{LIST_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CREATE_USER, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INSERT INTO PREBOM_OSPEC_MANDATORY_TRIM(LIST_ID, TRIM) VALUES (#{LIST_ID, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TRIM, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: DELETE PREBOM_OSPEC_MANDATORY_TRIM WHERE LIST_ID IN (SELECT LIST_ID FROM PREBOM_OSPEC_MANDATORY WHERE OSPEC_NO = #{OSPEC_NO, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
